RelatedSentence: A hazardous materials team was called to scene of an unattended death inside a south Boulder condo Monday , after officers found the materials for extracting hash oil inside the residence .
A hazmat team also was called to the scene after responding officers saw the materials used for making hash oil from dried marijuana , Boulder police Sgt. David Spraggs said .
